environment.style

Class TextureLibrary

  • java.lang.Object
    • environment.style.TextureLibrary

  • public class TextureLibrary
extends java.lang.Object
    TextureLibrary stores static references to all textures used in the simulation.
    Author:
    Simon Pageaud
